sched_compat.h

00001 #ifndef SCHED_COMPAT_H
00002 #define SCHED_COMPAT_H
00003 
00004 /*
00005  * Provide missing prototypes to old Glibc.
00006  */
00007 
00008 #include <sched.h>
00009 
00010 #if __GLIBC__ < 2 || __GLIBC__ == 2 && __GLIBC_MINOR__ < 3
00011 
00012 #include <errno.h>
00013 #include <asm/unistd.h>
00014 
00015 #define CPU_SETSIZE 1024
00016 
00017 typedef struct {
00018     unsigned long __bits [CPU_SETSIZE / (sizeof(unsigned long) * 8)];
00019 } cpu_set_t;
00020 
00021 #define CPU_ZERO(cpusetp)                                               \
00022     do {                                                                \
00023         unsigned __i;                                                   \
00024         cpu_set_t *arr = (cpusetp);                                     \
00025             for(__i = 0;                                                \
00026                 __i < sizeof(cpu_set_t) / sizeof(unsigned long);        \
00027                 __i++)                                                  \
00028                arr->__bits[__i]=0;                                      \
00029     } while (0)
00030 
00031 # define __CPUELT(cpu)  ((cpu) / (sizeof(unsigned long) * 8))
00032 # define __CPUMASK(cpu) \
00033     ((unsigned long) 1 << ((cpu) % (sizeof(unsigned long) * 8)))
00034 
00035 #define CPU_SET(cpu, cpusetp) \
00036     ((cpusetp)->__bits[__CPUELT (cpu)] |= __CPUMASK (cpu))
00037 
00038 
00039 static inline _syscall3(int,
00040                         sched_setaffinity,
00041                         pid_t, pid,
00042                         unsigned int, len,
00043                         const cpu_set_t *, mask);
00044 
00045 #define sched_setaffinity(pid, mask) \
00046     sched_setaffinity(pid, sizeof(cpu_set_t), mask)
00047 
00048 #endif /* Glibc version < 2.3 */
00049 
00050 #endif /* SCHED_COMPAT_H */
